title: Cozy Single Room
room_description: Our cozy single room is perfect for solo travelers. It features a comfortable bed and a small workspace for your convenience.
special_offer: Get 10% off for bookings made 7 days in advance.

title: Deluxe Double Room
room_description: Our deluxe double room is a spacious and comfortable option for couples. It includes a large bed and a sitting area for relaxation.
special_offer: Free breakfast included for all bookings.

title: Luxury Suite
room_description: Indulge in luxury with our spacious suite. It features a separate living area, a king-sized bed, and a private whirlpool bath.

title: Family Room
room_description: Our family room is perfect for a family of four. It includes two separate bedrooms, a common living area, and a kitchenette.
special_offer: Stay 3 nights or more and get a 15% discount.

title: Standard Twin Room
room_description: Our standard twin room is perfect for friends or colleagues traveling together. It includes two single beds and a workspace.

title: Executive Suite
room_description: Experience luxury and comfort in our executive suite. It features a private balcony, a king-sized bed, and a spacious living area.
special_offer: Complimentary bottle of champagne upon arrival.

title: Economy Single Room
room_description: Our economy single room is a budget-friendly option for solo travelers. It features a comfortable bed and basic amenities.
special_offer: 10% off for stays longer than 5 nights.

title: Ocean View Double Room
room_description: Enjoy stunning ocean views in our double room. It features a balcony, a large bed, and modern amenities.

title: Premium Suite
room_description: Indulge in luxury with our premium suite. It features a private terrace, a king-sized bed, and a spacious living area.

title: Standard Double Room
room_description: Our standard double room is a comfortable choice for couples. It includes a double bed and a sitting area for relaxation.

title: City View Suite
room_description: Enjoy breathtaking city views from our city view suite. It features a private balcony, a king-sized bed, and a spacious living area.
special_offer: Book a 5-night stay and receive a complimentary city tour.

title: Economy Twin Room
room_description: Our economy twin room is an affordable choice for friends or colleagues traveling together. It includes two single beds and basic amenities.
special_offer: 10% off for students with valid ID.
